content: chevron cloud yarn this pattern offers lots of flexibility for yarn choice pick 200g of any fingering-weight yarn and 75g of any silk/mohair blend laceweight yarn grey sample handmaiden maiden hair 67% silk 23% kid mohair 10% nylon and shibui knits silk cloud 60% kid mohair 40% silk yellow sample annie paaren grace 75% merino 15% cashmere 10% silk in rise up and lichen & lace marsh mohair 72% mohair 28% silk in amber needles & notions 4 5 mm us 7 or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle to weave in ends blocking pins gauge 16 stitches = 10 cm / 4 in garter stitch with fingering-weight yarn row gauge is not significant for this pattern measurements by melissa clulow 17 x 68 43 cm x 173 cm chevron cloud combines wonderfully luxurious yarns and graphic texture in a light versatile wrap that will make a beautiful addition to any wardrobe equally at home over a fancy dress or paired with jeans and a tee this soft modern rectangular wrap is an easy accessory choice for any occasion pick a decadent fingering-weight yarn and a lighter weight silk mohair blend for an exquisite drape and a delicate halo - the stuff of dreams and clouds espace tricot | www espacetricot com chevron cloud pattern with fingering-weight yarn cast on 121 stitches row 1 rs k1 ssk k17 yo k1 yo k18 md k18 yo repeat brackets once more k1 yo k17 k2tog k1 row 2 ws knit all stitches knit yo s through the back loop row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 repeat row 2 switch to silk/mohair laceweight yarn row 5 rs k1 ssk k17 yo k1 yo k18 md k18 yo repeat brackets once more k1 yo k17 k2tog k1 row 6 ws purl all sts purl yo s through the back loop row 7 repeat row 5 row 8 repeat row 6 repeat these 8 row alternating between the fingering-weight and laceweight every 4 row until wrap is desired length we ended at 68 but could easily have knit another 15 with the remaining yarn be sure to end with the fingering-weight yarn to match the cast on edge of the wrap cast off loosely sew in ends and lightly steam to block tip steaming with blocking pins at the point of each chevron will help give a crisp finish if you want to make the wrap wider cast on additional multiples of 40 stitches to accommodate the repeat in brackets abbreviations bor beginning of round co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together decrease md mitered decrease slip 2 stitches together as if to k2tog knit next stitch pass 2 slipped stitches over stitch just knitted 2 sts decreased p purl ssk slip 2 stitches knitwise knit these 2 stitches together through back loops decrease st s stitch es yo yarnover increase chevron cloud page 2 -
